column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Every menu item is some of the best I've ever tasted in that category
column2: and the prices are very reasonable for the quality and ambiance. The bone if filet is an absolute triumph. They even have a great bar with remarkable wine and whiskey selections. Although it claims to be French in its style
column3: it's really an unpretentious American steakhouse :)
